title: Oslo shooting: Norway attack being treated as Islamist terrorism, police say
content:
1. Oslo shooting: Norway attack being treated as Islamist terrorism, police say  BBC
  2. Oslo shooting near gay bar investigated as terrorism, as Pride parade is canceled  CNN
  3. 2 dead, 14 injured in mass shooting at gay club in Norway  New York Post
  4. Norway nightclub shooting: 2 dead, 10 injured in suspected terror-linked attack  Fox News
  5. Shooting at Oslo gay bar leaves at least two people dead ahead of Pride parade  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: オスロ銃撃事件 ノルウェーの攻撃はイスラム教徒のテロとして扱われている、と警察は述べている。
奥斯陆枪击案。警方称挪威袭击事件被当作伊斯兰恐怖主义处理
